commands.name: ban
commands.desc: When you insert a tag after the command, you ban the pinged user
commands.logmsg: An user has been BANNED from the server...

commands.name: kick
commands.desc: When you insert a tag after the command, you kick the pinged user
commands.logmsg: An user has been KICKED from the server...

commands.name: cls
commands.desc: If you write a number between 1-250 after typing this command, you delete that number of msgs
commands.logmsg: We have deleted a few messages from the server...

commands.name: lock
commands.desc: If you type this command on a channel, that channel gets locked

commands.name: unlock
commands.desc: If you type this command on a channel, that channel gets unlocked

commands.name: warn
commands.desc: When you insert a tag after the command, you warn the pinged user

commands.name: unwarn
commands.desc: When you insert a tag after the command, you unwarn the pinged user

commands.name: warns
commands.desc: The bot sends an embed with the warndes users in every server he is

commands.name: setwarns
commands.desc: Given an attached JSON file, the server warnings will be replaced by the given in that file
commands.logmsg: The WARNINGS MODULE has been changed...

commands.name: shutdown
commands.desc: Just shutdown the bot until the `turnon` command is called
commands.logmsg: The bot has been SHUT DOWN temporarily...

commands.name: turnon
commands.logmsg: The bot has been TURNED ON again...
